channel.title: 138 Combat?
channel.description: How do I change from 126 Combat to 138 Combat? Like prayer level's it to 138.

@mr_extremez wrote:

item.title: 138 Combat?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Client.java

public int getCombatLevel() {
        int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
		int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
		int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));
			if (ran > attstr) {
				combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
			} else if (mag > attstr) {
				combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
			} else {
				combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) 
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325)
						+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
			}
		return combatLevel;
	}

Player.java

		int mag = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
		int ran = (int) ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
		int attstr = (int) ((double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double) (getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));
			
		combatLevel = 0;
		if (ran > attstr) {
			combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
		} else if (mag > attstr) {
			combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
		} else {
			combatLevel = (int) (((getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325)
					+ ((getLevelForXP(playerXP[22])) * 0.125));
		}
